title: [突發] 美國駐北京大使館發生爆炸

replies.msg:
US Embassy Beijing 'explosion': Huge blast rocks Chinese capital with 'smoke everywhere'

Security personnel, including the military and police, were seen working around something under a blue tarpaulin within a cordon



Eyewitnesses are reporting a large explosion outside the US Embassy in Beijing.

Photos and video clips posted online show smoke, a cordon and a road partially blocked by police as eyewitnesses gather outside a gated compound.

Men in military uniforms were standing guard at the cordon, and many of the eyewitnesses were snapping photos or recording video with their mobile phones.

One video taken in the aftermath shows security personnel, including military and police, working around something under a blue tarpaulin within a cordon.

One person in normal clothes is kneeling next to the tarpaulin.

Chinese and American officials have not yet commented on the incident.

The alleged blast happened in an area where there are a number of embassies.

We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story.

港媒：北京美國駐華大使館外發生爆炸 疑似訪民引爆炸藥
2013-12-15 16:26:38
據香港《東方日報》報道，位於北京的美國駐華大使館前日發生爆炸事件，疑似訪民引爆自制的爆炸裝置。一名年約五十歲的男子以塑料瓶裝有疑是黑火藥的爆炸物，大喊「閃開」後點燃塑料瓶爆燃，男子被炸傷倒地。傷者及後向警察遞交上訪信後被警方帶走。據稱該名男子多次上訪無果後作出此激烈行為。

法廣網報道，據目擊者稱，前日下午兩時許，北京朝陽區安家樓路的美國駐華大使館簽證處有不少民眾正在排隊等待簽證，突然一名年約五十歲的男子站在大使館簽證處大門約一米處，手持裝有疑似黑火藥爆炸物的塑料礦泉水瓶，大喊「閃開」後，點燃塑料瓶爆燃，男子當場被炸傷倒地。

事件引起人群一陣騷動，大使館保安立即拉起警戒線，將傷者和爆燃現場隔開，數分鐘後警方趕至，傷者向警察遞交上訪信後被帶走。警方封鎖現場及對現場拍攝取證，並禁止行人上前觀看拍照。一名李姓知情者透露，該名訪民自稱冤情深重，長期上訪不果，走投無路下才到美國駐華大使館自爆。

美國駐華大使館新聞發言人柯英豪(Nolan Barkhouse)稱，已得知此事，對涉及使館安全政策方面的消息不予評論。

Security personnel, including the military and police, were seen working around something under a blue tarpaulin within a cordon



Eyewitnesses are reporting a large explosion outside the US Embassy in Beijing.

Photos and video clips posted online show smoke, a cordon and a road partially blocked by police as eyewitnesses gather outside a gated compound.

Men in military uniforms were standing guard at the cordon, and many of the eyewitnesses were snapping photos or recording video with their mobile phones.

One video taken in the aftermath shows security personnel, including military and police, working around something under a blue tarpaulin within a cordon.

One person in normal clothes is kneeling next to the tarpaulin.

Chinese and American officials have not yet commented on the incident.

The alleged blast happened in an area where there are a number of embassies.
